targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  toStartOfInterval(event_time, INTERVAL 60 SECOND) AS time,  -- Rounding to 60 seconds (modify as needed)
  avg(metric) AS value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    event_time, 
    sum(ProfileEvent_Query) AS metric 
  FROM 
    clusterAllReplicas(default, merge('system', '^metric_log'))
  WHERE 
    event_date >= toDate(now() - 3600)  -- Filter to the last 3600 seconds (adjust as needed)
    AND event_time >= now() - 3600
  GROUP BY 
    event_time
)
GROUP BY 
  time
ORDER BY 
  time WITH FILL STEP 60  -- Fill in missing intervals with a step size of 60 seconds
SETTINGS 
  skip_unavailable_shards = 1

SELECT 
  toStartOfInterval(event_time, INTERVAL 60 SECOND) AS time,  -- Replace 60 with your desired rounding interval
  avg(metric) / 1000000 AS value
FROM (
  SELECT 
    event_time, 
    sum(ProfileEvent_OSCPUVirtualTimeMicroseconds) AS metric 
  FROM 
    clusterAllReplicas(default, merge('system', '^metric_log'))
  WHERE 
    event_date >= toDate(now() - 3600)  -- Replace 3600 with your desired time range in seconds
    AND event_time >= now() - 3600
  GROUP BY 
    event_time
)
GROUP BY 
  time
ORDER BY 
  time WITH FILL STEP 60  -- Replace 60 with your rounding interval
SETTINGS 
  skip_unavailable_shards = 1

  toStartOfInterval(event_time, INTERVAL 60 SECOND) AS time,  -- Replace 60 with your desired rounding interval
  avg(value) AS avg_value
FROM 
  clusterAllReplicas(default, merge('system', '^asynchronous_metric_log'))
WHERE 
  event_date >= toDate(now() - 3600)  -- Replace 3600 with your desired time range in seconds
  AND event_time >= now() - 3600
  AND metric = 'OSUserTimeNormalized'
GROUP BY 
  time
ORDER BY
